column4: gamma problem with the monitor,, I understand it is a common problem in Gutsy,, I've noticed other bugs as well,, has anyone had this problem
thanks,, the monitor is too bright ('it physically set to the lowest setting but still everything appears white)
what kernel/video card do you have?
I just installed Gutsey over Dapper,,  I'm using 7.10. The monitor is a generic LCD
do you know which video card you have? if not that is fine - we can use the generic method
ok - open terminal and type 'sudo xgamma -gamma 0.5'
think should bring the gamma a bit - if you see no change then it isn't a gamma problem
That helped,, the font is darker,, and I think the number of colors were reduced
taking it to 0.2 make's it look almost normal
nevermind - that last thing won't work.
after the video directory I have no more files
yea - I kinda figured. play around with xgamma till you find a good setting.
